SELECT SEQ_RESERVATION_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO RESERVATION ( RSV_SEQ, GUEST_ID, HOST_ID, RSV_CHECK_IN_DT, RSV_CHECK_OUT_DT, RSV_CHECK_IN_TIME, RSV_CHECK_OUT_TIME, NUM_GUESTS, TOTAL_AMT, FINAL_AMT, RSV_STAT, RSV_PAYMENT_STAT, CANCEL_DT, CANCEL_REASON, REFUND_AMT, GUEST_MSG, HOST_MSG, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT, ROOM_TYPE_SEQ ) VALUES ( SEQ_RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{guestId}, #{hostId}, #{rsvCheckInDt}, #{rsvCheckOutDt}, #{rsvCheckInTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsvCheckOutTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numGuests}, #{totalAmt}, #{finalAmt}, #{rsvStat, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsvPaymentStat, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cancelDt, jdbcType=DATE}, #{cancelReason, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundAmt, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{guestMsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostMsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{roomTypeSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT RSV_SEQ, GUEST_ID, HOST_ID, RSV_CHECK_IN_DT, RSV_CHECK_OUT_DT, RSV_CHECK_IN_TIME, RSV_CHECK_OUT_TIME, NUM_GUESTS, TOTAL_AMT, FINAL_AMT, RSV_STAT, RSV_PAYMENT_STAT, CANCEL_DT, CANCEL_REASON, REFUND_AMT, GUEST_MSG, HOST_MSG, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT, ROOM_TYPE_SEQ FROM RESERVATION WHERE GUEST_ID = #{guestId} ORDER BY RSV_SEQ DESC

SELECT RSV_SEQ, GUEST_ID, HOST_ID, RSV_CHECK_IN_DT, RSV_CHECK_OUT_DT, RSV_CHECK_IN_TIME, RSV_CHECK_OUT_TIME, NUM_GUESTS, TOTAL_AMT, FINAL_AMT, RSV_STAT, RSV_PAYMENT_STAT, CANCEL_DT, CANCEL_REASON, REFUND_AMT, GUEST_MSG, HOST_MSG, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT, ROOM_TYPE_SEQ FROM RESERVATION WHERE RSV_SEQ = #{rsvSeq}

SELECT RSV_SEQ, GUEST_ID, HOST_ID, RSV_CHECK_IN_DT, RSV_CHECK_OUT_DT, RSV_CHECK_IN_TIME, RSV_CHECK_OUT_TIME, NUM_GUESTS, TOTAL_AMT, FINAL_AMT, RSV_STAT, RSV_PAYMENT_STAT, CANCEL_DT, CANCEL_REASON, REFUND_AMT, GUEST_MSG, HOST_MSG, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT, ROOM_TYPE_SEQ FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, RSV_SEQ, GUEST_ID, HOST_ID, RSV_CHECK_IN_DT, RSV_CHECK_OUT_DT, RSV_CHECK_IN_TIME, RSV_CHECK_OUT_TIME, NUM_GUESTS, TOTAL_AMT, FINAL_AMT, RSV_STAT, RSV_PAYMENT_STAT, CANCEL_DT, CANCEL_REASON, REFUND_AMT, GUEST_MSG, HOST_MSG, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT, ROOM_TYPE_SEQ FROM(SELECT RSV_SEQ, GUEST_ID, HOST_ID, NVL(RSV_CHECK_IN_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD') RSV_CHECK_IN_DT, NVL(RSV_CHECK_OUT_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD') RSV_CHECK_OUT_DT, NVL(RSV_CHECK_IN_TIME,'HH24:MI') RSV_CHECK_IN_TIME, NVL(RSV_CHECK_OUT_TIME,'HH24:MI') RSV_CHECK_OUT_TIME, NVL(NUM_GUESTS,0) NUM_GUESTS, NVL(TOTAL_AMT,0) TOTAL_AMT, NVL(FINAL_AMT,0) FINAL_AMT, NVL(RSV_STAT,'PENDING') RSV_STAT, NVL(RSV_PAYMENT_STAT,'PENDING') RSV_PAYMENT_STAT, CANCEL_DT, NVL(CANCEL_REASON,'') CANCEL_REASON, NVL(REFUND_AMT,0) REFUND_AMT, NVL(GUEST_MSG,'') GUEST_MSG, NVL(HOST_MSG,'') HOST_MSG, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT, ROOM_TYPE_SEQ FROM RESERVATION WHERE HOST_ID = #{hostId} ORDER BY RSV_SEQ DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
